Meeting Notes

Report back

  • EVALUATING 3D MODELLING USER INTERFACES

Honours project work by Siobhan O'Donovan and Steven Rybicki evaluating the use of Interactive Shadows and Rotation Controllers in 3D Modelling Interfaces. Supervised by Assoc. Prof. James Gain & Dr Brian DeRenzi.
